name: Prof. Dr. Raphael von Heereman
goal: Offering Consultancy Services for airlines and the maritime  industry in the field of aeropolitical, regulatory and environmental affairs bringing in more than 30 years experience in the aviation sector
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: All initiatives from the Commission affecting airlines in the field of aeropolitical, regulatory and environmental field. Meeting members of the European Parliament to learn more about their understanding and their initiatives in the fields described above.
